EditText.android:text: Ager Novus would like to thank the following that helps us develop, validate and certified the CDDMA: Cow Diseases Detector for Mobile Application.
Dairy Farms and Offices: - Luzon Dairy Cooperative - ARB Livestock - Mateo Cow and Calf Farms - City Veterinary Office (SJDM Branch)
Veterinarians and Livestock Owners: - Dr. Arvin Agapito - Dr. Jayson Perez - Dr. Rhommel Mendoza - Dr. Jose Restituto De Ocampo - Dr. Arby Banaag
Contacts: - Dr. Arvin Agapito (arvinagapito82@yahoo.com), Dr. Jayson Perez (jayson.perez@gmail.com.ph), Allan Ray Baluyut (konsi_arb@yahoo.com.ph)
